title: The Loop Trail Quest
description:
Software written to accommodate a field survey regarding peoples’ relationships with the local park environment and the delineating results between different educational approaches. Developed for Android targeting Kindle Fire devices, the software supports both landscape and portrait mode. 
The Loop Trail “Quest”: Use of a Choice-based Digital Simulation, An Interactive Video, and a Booklet to Communicate and Analyze Decision-making of Park Visitors: https://doi.org/10.1080/17524032.2021.1927129
